translation.description:
MODCom is your chance to drive the direction of Malaysia's open data journey! A community involving public servants, the private sector, and civil society, MODCom brings together data scientists, subject matter experts, and policymakers to ensure that Malaysia's open data doesn't just stay at the frontier, but shapes it.

Don't just ask for change - make it!
translation.link_to_showcase2: products built by the open data community
translation.fill_form: Fill in your details to apply:
translation.experience: Describe your experience in data science and your area of expertise!
translation.area_required: Please choose your area of expertise.
translation.email_required: Please fill in your email address.
translation.exp_required: Please fill in your achievements and experiences.
translation.email_invalid: Please fill in a valid email address.
translation.received:
We have received your application to join the MODCom!
Within 5 minutes, you should receive an email from data.dtsa@digital.gov.my with further details.
